title: LP seems a bit retarded???
body:
Some games i get 23 LP for and then others i get 17 for. (Even when i havent lost a game in between.) 

Can anyone tell me whats happening here?

replies.body:
Well, LP gained is roughly related to your current MMR (compared to your opponents) as of winning the game.

Brief summary, MMR is the new elo. It's a numerical value that's meant to represent your skill by a single variable. MMR could vary from 500 to 2000, usually. When you get matched into a game, the servers match you against people of similar MMR to you, to create a competitive game for all. Since not everyone has the same MMR, there will always be a slightly imbalance in the total MMR one team has to another.

If you are on the team which has more MMR, then you are considered to be the 'favourite' to win. If you do win, then your LP gains are sligthly reduced to compensate for this. If you're on the underdog side and you win, then your LP gains are slightly increased to compensate.

Really ingenious if you ask me.
